articles.description: A South Australian-developed SARS-CoV-19 vaccine is preparing to progress to the final stages of human clinical trials after early animal testing confirmed its safety and effectiveness in preventing COVID-19 lung infection.

articles.author: Andrew McGarry
articles.title: FA CEO James Johnson says Australia is not bidding for the FIFA World Cup, but points to 2034 as next opening - ABC News
articles.description: FA chief James Johnson says Australia does aspire to host the World Cup at some point, and that 2034 would be the next realistic opening — but he deflects speculation that a bid is in the works.
articles.content:
Football Australia chief executive James Johnson hosed down speculation about an Australian bid for the 2030 or 2034 World Cup, but said it was an aspiration for the country to host at some point.

articles.title: Journalist trolled by anti-vaxxers after promoting vaccine despite developing rare side effect - SBS
articles.description: An Australian journalist has been trolled by anti-vaxxers and conservatives from the US and UK after claiming she’d get ‘vaccinated again’ despite developing a rare side effect associated with the Pfizer jab.
articles.content:
As she was recovering from an extremely rare side effect of the Pfizer jab, Daily Telegraphjournalist Georgia Clark uploaded a video from her hospital bed.
